review: We were attending a wedding when my wife fell ill with high fever. With heavy rains, we thought of trying Practo to find a doctor nearby the wedding hall. We chanced upon Dr.Havila and setup a video consulting session. She was available within the next few minutes and guided us on what had to be done next. We got my wife admitted in easymom clinic. Dr.Havila was in constant touch with the caregiving team even though the admission was done close to midnight. The diagnosis, treatment and care given was fantastic. I would highly recommend both Dr.Havila and the easymom clinic to anyone.
She is caring,kind and has ears to the patient. My wife was happy consulting with her. I used practo online consultation for the first time. I felt like it's totally worth because of this doctor.
very lovely and soft spoken ❤️ I'm really statisfied with thr medicines she gave as well. she is a nice human as well.
hospital is very neat, well maintained. Docotor is very polite and very friendly, clearly explained and suggested very much.

Hi...year back I met havila mam for my second time pregnancy... starting from my initial days throughout delivery she was soo kind and her positive thoughts really helped me on my labour... Well maintained and clean ambience.. Friendly faculty members and nurses.. i highly recommend havila mam for safe and happy pregnancy... **** ******** ** *** ******

she is very kind and experienced.. hospitality is soo gud i never seen anywhere like this. all staffs are very polite and kind. covid 19 procedure is followed perfectly. Hospital is very neat and maintained cleanly. so pleasant atmosphere. i want to continue my consultation here always.

review: i went to clarify about my missed period...doctor spoke very patiently and sweet..she clarified all my doubts and prescribed suitable medicines..waiting time also soo quick..place was soo neat and kind speaking staffs

Dr was very kind and staffs were friendly. Dr cares each and every patient’s wellness. Staffs were very pleasing to the patients. The hospital was very clean and pleasant. Overall experience was great.
very friendly and clear explanation given ... Covid 19 safety protocols were up to the mark ...clean environment
